'''''A Tolkien Book of Days''''' is a blank diary featuring illustrations by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (first published in ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'') and many quotations (from ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', and ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'') and biographic details. 

Except for the introduction,<ref>"[http://www.tolkienguide.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?topic_id=1533&forum=9&post_id=7943#forumpost7943 A Tolkien Book of Days]" at [http://www.tolkienguide.com/ Tolkien Collector's Guide] (accessed 31 May 2011)</ref> ''A Tolkien Book of Days'' was first published as ''[[The Tolkien Diary 1992|The Tolkien Diary]]'' (Grafton 1992).

==From the back==

This handsome book of days can be used as a dateless diary and as a birthday book. It contains Tolkien's own delicate illustrations plus a wealth of quotations and biographical details - both from Tolkien's own life and from within his works.
